programme.title: The secrets of a long life
programme.short_synopsis: Jeanne Calment, the world's oldest woman celebrates her 120th birthday.
programme.medium_synopsis: What is the secret of longevity? Alistair Cooke investigates the factors that have been attributed to elongated lifespans and profiles the world's oldest woman Jeanne Calment.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
